body.p: You may also train sentence constituents and functions.
Two of the games on the VISL pages may be used for this purpose. The VISL group of the SDU has made the games, and the UiT has provided the North Saami content.
The games are beta versions. This implies that there may be errors in the games, and that there is room for improvement. Comments and suggestions are always welcome!

p.em: We are still adjusting the functions in the game to the structure of Saami. So, we advice you to not use these games in sceduled courses.

body.p: If you want to adjust the games to the level of your students, have look at our sentence collections
If you want to learn more about sentence analysis, have a look at the Sentence trees document.
